find_psi_lines(tk_controller=None)¶
find_roots(tk_controller=None)¶

Displays a plot, and has the user click on an approximate zero point. Uses a root finder to adjust to the more exact point. Right click to disable. Parameter:

  • tk_controller : Tk object

A reference to the root TK object (for usage in gui mode).

@author: watkins35, garcia299
